/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/vulkanCppTest.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/vulkanCppTest.dir/VulkanLayerAndExtension.cpp.o CMakeFiles/vulkanCppTest.dir/VulkanInstance.cpp.o CMakeFiles/vulkanCppTest.dir/VulkanApplication.cpp.o CMakeFiles/vulkanCppTest.dir/VulkanDevice.cpp.o CMakeFiles/vulkanCppTest.dir/VulkanBufferManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/vulkanCppTest.dir/VulkanRenderer.cpp.o  -o vulkanCppTest -lglfw -lvulkan
